Continue Country Options Revoking account for %1$s Adding account for %1$s Send Message Add Account Remove Accounts Adding emails to your RelaySMS account enables you use them to send emails using SMS messaging.\n\nGmail are currently supported. Adding numbers to your RelaySMS account enables you use them to send messages using SMS messaging.\n\nTelegram messaging is currently supported. Adding accounts to your RelaySMS account enables you use them to make post using SMS messaging.\n\nPosting is currently supported. Your RelaySMS account is an alias of your phone number with the domain @relaysms.me.\n\nYou can receive replies by SMS whenever a message is sent to your alias. Continue to send an email from your saved email account. You can choose a message forwarding country from the \'Countries\' tab below.\n\nContinue to send message Continue to send messages from your saved messaging account. You can choose a message forwarding country from the \'Countries\' tab below.\n\nContinue to send message Continue to make posts from your saved messaging account. You can choose a message forwarding country from the \'Countries\' tab below.\n\nContinue to send message Your RelaySMS account is an alias of your phone number with the domain @relaysms.me.\n\nYou can receive replies by SMS whenever a message is sent to your alias.\nYou can choose a message forwarding country from the \'Countries\' tab below.\n\nContinue to send message Select an account Please enter your Telegram code without copying it from the message - copying might get flagged and Telegram might block your account. Phone Number Code Hide password Show password No account selected Compose Email To Subject New Message Sender Recipient Number Message New Post What\'s happening? Connecting the world, one SMS at a time RelaySMS is an open-source initiative focused on enabling communication through SMS without relying on internet connectivity. We believe in a connected world, and we\'re making it happen one SMS at a time. RelaySMS remains free and open source. App Tutorial Support us by starring our GitHub repository and sharing it with your friends! Available platforms Use your RelaySMS account Use your online accounts Navigate back to home screen Create RelaySMS Account "Create your account and " save platforms " for RelaySMS to send messages to Gmail, X, and Telegram on your behalf when offline" "I have read the " privacy policy Log in Sign Up Selected Gateway Client No Gateway Client Selected Available Countries Gateway clients refreshed successfully! No messages in inbox Paste new incoming message Log Into RelaySMS "Log into your account and " " for RelaySMS to send messages to Gmail, X, and Telegram on your behalf when offline" Already got code "Do not have an account? " Get started with Compose Message "Use your phone number to send an email with the alias: " Login with Internet These features requires you to have an internet connection Input Your Code Please enter the 6-digit code we sent to you via SMS The code would automatically be detected in some cases Paste encrypted text into this box… This is an example of an encrypted message that you would paste here… RelaySMS Reply Please paste this entire message in your RelaySMS app Click to paste Decrypt message Send your first message… Save platforms Phone Lockscreen options Enable lockscreen Require lockscreen pin/fingerprint when starting the app Vault Choose which platforms you want to remove from the vault Account Clear aliasing This would delete your auth codes stored for aliasing. You can request for another code at anytime. Logout Logout of your account. You can always log back in, however your current messages would be deleted. Delete Deleting your account means deleting all your saved accounts online. You can always recreate your account once needed. Accessibility Language Messaging Security and Privacy Security Enable app locks and pin codes
English Arabic French Farsi Spanish German Swahili Turkish Chinese Korean Hindi Shona
Welcome to RelaySMS! Use SMS to make a post, send emails and messages with no internet connection Learn how it works Read our privacy policy Skip You are ready to begin sending messages from RelaySMS Great! RelaySMS Vaults securely stores your online accounts, so that you can access them without an internet connection You can add online accounts to your vault OK Make default Edit Delete View on GitHub Send new message Password Re-enter password Already have an account Create account Login Forgot password Submit Re-send code Revoke platforms From always add the dialing code if absent, e.g +237 Cc Bcc Paste message Error decrypting text You can also send out emails without an account or Vault This will create a default email (your_phonenumber@relaysms.me) using your phone number. Next https://smswithoutborders.com/privacy-policy Version %1$s Compose new Add account / Compose new Add Number Forgot Password? Enter your phone number and new password and we would send you a code via SMS to reset your password. New Password Reset Password Passwords do not match Discard Message discarded! Time left until code expires: %1$ds Something went wrong No results found Search message Bug Report RelaySMS - Bug Report Request new code in: Request new code! https://gatewayserver.smswithoutborders.com/v3/clients/%1$s/tests Store OAuth2.0 Tokens on Device Turning on this feature automatically deletes your tokens for platforms that utilize OAuth2.0 (Gmail and X) on the server and saves them in your device. Bear in mind RelaySMS utilizes these tokens to send messages on your behalf for the above platforms. Therefore in case you lose your device or happen to re-install this application, your tokens will be lost and you will have to revoke existing stored accounts and store them again to get new tokens Turning off this setting will prevent subsequent tokens from being stored on your device. Messages for platforms with existing tokens stored on your device will still be able to publish regardless. In any case of missing tokens, please revoke for the accounts involved and store again. Are you sure you want to continue with this action? Your following accounts may have missing tokens. You might need to revoke and add them again to ensure message publishing works correctly, especially if \'Store Tokens On-device\' is enabled: Successfully refreshed tokens Error refreshing tokens: %s Tokens for subsequent accounts won\'t be stored on device An unexpected error occuered: %s Do not show this again Missing Tokens Info Store Tokens On-device Storing Platform Accounts When adding accounts for platforms that utilize OAuth2.0 (e.g Gmail, X), enabling this makes sure your access tokens are rather stored on your current device Stored Tokens Detected Stored tokens for this account have been detected. You can use your stored tokens to make a post on just ONCE. As long as the \"Store Tokens on Device\" setting is on, you\'ll be able to make X posts just once. To make more posts with this account, revoke and add this account again for every post. Note: Turning off the \"Store Tokens on Device\" feature while making sure you have tokens stored online would allow you to make multiple posts on X without having to revoke and store again. You can now request for the tokens of your OAuth2.0 accounts to be stored on your device by going to Settings > Security. Unknown This message\'s content could not be displayed. Message Message content could not be displayed Text Message https://publisher.smswithoutborders.com/v1/platforms" Recipient account Make sure the recipient account is in the right format. Slack Channel or User For channels: use #name or an ID (e.g., #general or C123ABC). For DMs: use @username, an email, or a user ID (e.g., @jane or @user@gmail.com or U456DEF). You can now see the account you are currently logged into by clicking the menu icon on the navigation bar" Your Account Set as default SMS app Log in or sign up to save your online accounts. SMS/MMS Could not fetch publisher key. Could not find platform details for \'%1$s\'. No default gateway client configured. Multiple Ratchet states found in database. Expected at most one. Send failed Account is required for V1 platform messages. Could not fetch publisher key. Cannot encrypt message. SMS an email right now! You don\'t need an account, we\'d create one for you!\nEmail yourself! Don\'t ask again Close this to continue sending... Way to go!! There is more!! You have interacted with how easy it is to send your first message! Save your accounts! You can also use SMS to send messages from your online accounts! Saving them guarantees you can use them without an internet connection. Give it a try! Your platforms and security keys are saved in your account! Create one or login if you have created already Let\'s get you started! Now we can save platforms in your account! Save platforms to your account It\'s easier than you can imagine You can save more accounts per platform at anytime from inside the app! Start messaging now! You can now send messages from your saved accounts!\nYou can also save more accounts later... Ready to save platforms! You are now ready! You have successfully carried out the essentials of messaging with RelaySMS! Secure your app! Let\'s lock this down! From locking with device pin code to other secure ways of making sure you maintain your app\'s privacy! Failed to set biometric authentication Make default SMS app You can manage all your SMS messages from a single place. This also unlocks features like sending images with SMS (yes not MMS) You can only save these platforms after you log in Unknown error
